"Oh, welcome!": "What's on today's agenda?"
"How've you been?"
"Are your brothers doing well?"
"Quite well, thankfully."
"Yeah, almost too well."

"Ilma is just as devoted to
his research as ever."

"I think Taivas and Tulli have been competing
to see who can take down more enemies."
"And Kukka's been helping me out a lot lately."

"In that respect, they're the
same as they've always been."
"They have changed in other ways, though..."

"Kukka's been going outside
with the others more often."

"Sometimes he'll go take out some
enemies with Taivas and Tulli..."

"Other times he'll help Ilma
with his field research."

"As for Taivas and Tulli, they actually
stick together more often out on the field."

"Whereas before they would split up, with
one going east, and the other going west."

"It also feels like they've been
helping me out more often."

"They come with me to hunt Tames,
or gather fruits and vegetables."

"I want to say there are things
I help out with too, but..."

"Like, when Ilma starts really investigating something,
everything he says is just gibberish to me."

"...Speaking of conversations, there've been
more chances to talk with Aina and Manon too."

"Aina's been telling me about all of her travels so far,
and what it was like back in Aelio Town and stuff."
"She's been through so much hardship."

"But she doesn't have any trouble
talking to me about it."

"'Cause we've both
been through hard times."
"That makes me really happy."
"And then there's Manon."

"She teaches me all this stuff I've never would've
known about, since I've always just lived up here."

"All the different creatures
and environments and stuff."

"Sometimes she talks about stuff I don't understand,
but she's nowhere near as bad as Ilma."

"Oh, hey. Do you have
some time after this?"

"I want you to tell me a
bit about yourself as well."
"I'd love to."
"Sure, but not for long."
"Alright, good."
"Alright, that's fine."
"Here, let's talk inside the lodge."
